message:
شباب، حد يحب يشتغل معايا على المشروع دة؟
https://www.innocentive.com/ar/challenge/9933942

This is called "innovation challenge", with a reward of $25,000. If you're not familiar with Innocentive, it is basically a platform that connects companies seeking innovative solutions to certain problems/challenges they face, with solvers who can provide such solutions. Most of the challenges  are very industry-specific, but this one is pretty doable with some of the skills and expertise available here. Read the details and if you're interested PM me with your expertise and let's form a team and win :) btw I happened to win a couple of such challenges before so that's why I say it's doable :)
story: Hussein Ghaly shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: How to Capture and Securely Transmit a Patient Image to a Clinician | InnoCentive Challenge
caption: innocentive.com
description: As part of a clinical trial, patients are sometimes asked to record information between office visits. The patient’s assessment of a finding may not match the clinical diagnosis. It would be helpful for subjects to be able to document each event with an image that can be shared with their physician....

data.message: Submissions to this Challenge must be received by 11:59 PM (US Eastern Time) on January 8, 2017.....I think it's very late t start now
